name: Export, Import and Update Library
description:
Example of how to export, import and update a library from and to webgme.
 The active node (i.e. open node on the canvas) will be the starting point, expect when importing a project.

configStructure.name: type
configStructure.description: What library action should be taken?

configStructure.name: file
configStructure.description: WebGME library file and optionally exported assets.

configStructure.name: assets
configStructure.description: Export all encountered assets and return a zip package.
